entry.content: Something I get curious about - I wonder how many actual physical people there are in the world who really know how to perform certain super-specialized technical tasks that are essential for modern civilization. Like how many people are there who can design and manufacture a modern turbine engine? How many can design, construct, and operate a modern IC fab? Or manufacture new high-precision machine tools from scratch, or design and manufacture a really great truck engine, or any number of other fields I don't even know about.
